content: enhance your home with the modern styling of this crochet blanket that brings warmth to a room stitched in our plush bernat blanket o go the bold geometric design is sure to become a designer s favorite in any room since the self-striping yarn does all the colorwork you can focus on practicing single_crochet and intarsia techniques pattern includes a handy chart for perfect results yarn for model bernat® blanket™ o go™ 10 5 oz/300 g 220 yds/201 m monochrome 42001 7 o gos
